data.title: tgtincorporated
data.meta_description: Information about the company and the leadership of the company.
data.text:
The Team

Biggest and Best Contractors - US, China and Angola

KBR is a US technology company and a global provider of comprehensive solutions for the energy and chemicals markets. KBR’s experience as a technology developer and licensor, along with comprehensive studies and proven project delivery capabilities, have resulted in KBR licensing, designing or constructing more than 60 greenfield refineries and well over 1,000 refining units of every type and size the world over

​

KBR | We Deliver

McDermott is a multinational EPCI company with operations in the Americas, Middle East, the Caspian Sea and the Pacific Rim. McDermott provides a complete spectrum of engineering, procurement, fabrication and construction services for the refining industry.

​

Home - MDR (mcdermott.com)

Honeywell is a US multinational conglomerate headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina It primarily operates in four areas of business Aerospace, Building technologies, Performance Materials Technologies, and Safety Productivity Solutions Honeywell is a Fortune 100 company The company has a global workforce of approximately 110,000 workers, with approximately 44 000 employed in the United States.

​

Honeywell - The Future Is What We Make It

Cisco is an American multinational technology conglomerate headquartered in San Jose, California, in the center of Silicon Valley Cisco develops, manufactures and sells networking hardware, software, telecommunications equipment and other high technology services and products.

​

Networking, Cloud, and Cybersecurity Solutions - Cisco

CMEC is a construction and engineering company, forming one part of the China National Machinery Industry Corporation (Sinomach) group of companies. A specialization of CMEC is construction of power projects in generation, transmission, and distribution. CMEC is engaged in many sectors including power, water supply and treatment, transportation, telecommunications, building construction, processing plants and mining. CMEC has presence in 63 countries.

​

中国机械设备工程股份有限公司 (cmec.com)

Mota-Engil is a Portuguese company in the sectors of civil construction, public works, port operations, waste, water, and logistics. The Mota-Engil Group comprises of 228 companies within three major business areas operating in 21 countries through its branches and subsidiaries, including Mota-Engil Africa. Mota-Engil is ranked in the sector's 30 biggest European companies and it is the only Portuguese company in the World Top 100.

​

Homepage EN - Mota-Engil

RAEL is a unique research, devel­op­ment, project implemen­ta­tion, and com­mu­nity out­reach facil­ity based at the Uni­ver­sity of Cal­i­for­nia, Berke­ley in the Energy and Resources Group and the Depart­ment of Nuclear Engi­neer­ing. The laboratory’s mis­sion is to help energy tech­nolo­gies con­tribute to envi­ron­men­tally sus­tain­able devel­op­ment while address­ing the cul­tural con­text and range of poten­tial social impacts of any new tech­nol­ogy or resource man­age­ment system.

​

Renewable & Appropriate Energy Laboratory (berkeley.edu)

TGT is a high technology company focused on high technology systems, services and infrastructure deployment in Emerging Markets. TGT teams with government, business and industry leaders to develop Transformational Projects - individual or series of interventions that support deep, systemic, and sustainable change with the potential for large-scale impact in an area of a major development challenge.

​

Broadband Content and APPS | Tgtincorporated | United States

Quanten LLC is a global standout in environmental sustainability through thoughtful, equitable, economic progress. The drivers of sustainable energy systems include the mix of scientific, technical, and policy during the design phase, with a keen eye on the financial, execution and operations phase.

​

Main (quanten.us)

Friburge is teamed with James Fisher. James Fisher provides a comprehensive range of port and terminal services, handling a vast range of international trade and cargo types. Capabilities extend from the provision of quayside equipment and fendering and mooring solutions, to the design, manufacture and supply of intelligent berthing and container weighing systems, all supporting the efficient operation and maximized capacity of ports and terminal infrastructure.

​

Home | James Fisher and Sons plc (james-fisher.com)

The U.S. - Angola Chamber of Commerce (USACC) is an independent, non-for-profit, corporate membership organization mandated to promote trade and investment between the United States and the Republic of Angola. USACC's goal is to put U.S. businesses at the forefront of Angola's development priorities.

​

Home - U.S. - ANGOLA CHAMBER OF COMMERCE (us-angola.org)

AIX a strategic project development and innovation company helping businesses and organizations with structural development, public relations, strategic marketing, transformation management, and logistics. We coordinate a diverse talent of creative minds to unravel challenges, cultivate mitigating strategies and drive transformation process. We are transformation agents with a niche for managing and implementing internal and external communication; investor ventures, and customized campaigns.

​

AIX – Consulting | Project Management | Strategy Development (aixfirm.com)

YMR Group is an Angolan owned company with engineering centered activities in several industries including energy. The YMR Group provides products such as filtration systems, pressure products, hydraulic products, pumps, pumping systems, tanks, baskets, chemicals and fluids. The YMR Group also provides services to the energy industry.

YMR GROUP – Adding Value to Your Life (ymrindustrial.com)

Atis is an Angolan company and is the local business partner for Emerson. Emerson commissions the activities in Angola and executes with Atis. Its main services are inspection, assets integrity management, NDT, drilling, production operations and specialized workforce provider for several business areas including project management.

​

Recrutamento | AtisNebest - Angola | Luanda (atisnebestangola.com)
